backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types for users, products, orders, educational content, business credit, dropshipping partners, B2B services, and comparisons for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Lists verified feature evidence describing banner, button, and appointment dashboard53 implementation with file mappings and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries for each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point with metadata, icons, PWA manifest link, and root div for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA configuration defining app name, icons, theme colors, categories, and screenshots.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, authentication handling, profile setup gating, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Admin interface for viewing users, filtering them, and assigning or updating access and system roles.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines global layout with navigation, authentication controls, role badges, banner area, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component allowing users to submit name and email to create their profile using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/startup/Activiti: Displays user activities, progress tracking, and lets users mark activities as complete.
frontend/src/components/startup/Business: Shows business credit progress and lets users update verification and bureau registration statuses.
frontend/src/components/startup/ClassesL: Lists lessons, tracks completion progress, and supports navigating into lesson details.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Renders a full lesson view with video, content, and a button to mark the lesson as complete.
frontend/src/components/startup/VirtualM: Displays upcoming and past virtual meetings for the logged-in user, with detailed meeting cards and links to join or view recordings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, meetings, activities, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom animated text and branding CSS utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it with global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard UI with tabs and CRUD controls for products, orders, lessons, meetings, activities, services, integrations, and user roles.
frontend/src/pages/AppCenterPage.tsx: Manages CRUD operations for app integrations with dialogs, form validation, and identity-gated access. Uses hooks to load, add, update, delete, and configure webhook integrations.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDashboard5: Displays a scheduling dashboard embedding a Calendly iframe with links and supporting UI. Includes description of an apprenticeship program.
frontend/src/pages/B2BDashboard.tsx: Shows an authenticated B2B dashboard with stats, tabs, and recent project listings. Redirects users without the B2B role.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and admins to configure funnel partner settings. Includes URL validation, dialogs, and integration updates.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page presenting business features and service categories with navigation actions. Includes hero section, branding, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment failure message with retry and home navigation options. Provides simple error UI with icon and card layout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Processes successful plan purchases and registers users with appropriate roles. Shows confirmation UI and routes users to the correct dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Renders the startup member dashboard with sections, role-gating, and tabbed content for classes, meetings, activities, and business credit.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Implements the store interface with product listing, plan selection, cart actions, and checkout session creation using user authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths for styling across the project.
project_state.json: Stores high-level project metadata, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues for ANC Marketplace.
